rows.label: bf05300100_0010
rows.name:
So you're Rex.
I've heard much.

rows.label: bf05300100_0020
rows.name: Y-You,

rows.label: bf05300100_0025
rows.name: Y-you're Acedia's...

rows.label: bf05300100_0030
rows.name: Huh? No way.

rows.label: bf05300100_0040
rows.name: Indeed, I am Marveni.

rows.label: bf05300100_0050
rows.name:
I understand your surprise. I imagine you
expected somebody older.

rows.label: bf05300100_0060
rows.name: We heard that you were Cole-san's Driver...

rows.label: bf05300100_0080
rows.name: Ah, Y-Your Holiness.

rows.label: bf05300100_0100
rows.name:
No need for formalities. I am a mere
representative of the Holy See.

rows.label: bf05300100_0110
rows.name: The title Pope is nothing but decoration.

rows.label: bf05300100_0120
rows.name:
In any case, we're the same, you and I.
Drivers of the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf05300100_0130
rows.name: I consider us...equals.

rows.label: bf05300100_0140
rows.name:
Ahaha, I feel a bit better now you've
put it that way. Your Holiness.

rows.label: bf05300100_0150
rows.name:
You're different somehow.
I seem to recall a more forceful personality.

rows.label: bf05300100_0170
rows.name: Oh! I almost forgot, here-

rows.label: bf05300100_0180
rows.name: I got this from Cole-san.

rows.label: bf05300100_0190
rows.name: He said it belonged to you. Please!

rows.label: bf05300100_0200
rows.name:
Ah...Cole...
That brings back memories.

rows.label: bf05300100_0210
rows.name:
We're looking for a way to Eden.
Cole-san told us...that you would know the way.

rows.label: bf05300100_0220
rows.name:
I have to get to Eden!
To...to save Alst any way I can!

rows.label: bf05300100_0230
rows.name:
I mean, we won't know for sure what we can do
until we get there, I suppose.

rows.label: bf05300100_0240
rows.name:
But if the stories are true, it's somewhere we
can all live safely! It has to be real!

rows.label: bf05300100_0250
rows.name: Long ago...

rows.label: bf05300100_0255
rows.name: Too long ago, I used to think like you.

rows.label: bf05300100_0260
rows.name: Indeed, it led me to climb the World Tree.

rows.label: bf05300100_0270
rows.name: However... I did not reach Eden.

rows.label: bf05300100_0280
rows.name: Nor did I meet God.

rows.label: bf05300100_0290
rows.name: I believe...it was because I was unworthy.

rows.label: bf05300100_0300
rows.name:
Rex, I know your desire all too well.
I shall help you on your quest.

rows.label: bf05300100_0310
rows.name:
Really?
Oh, thank you so much!

rows.label: bf05300100_0320
rows.name:
No need for thanks.
This may be my destiny.

rows.label: bf05300100_0330
rows.name: The reason I've lived all these years.

rows.label: bf05300100_0335
rows.name: And now...

rows.label: bf05300100_0340
rows.name: Homura. My name is Homura.

rows.label: bf05300100_0350
rows.name: I would be honored to have a moment alone with Homura.

rows.label: bf05300100_0360
rows.name: I'd like to...reminisce a little.
